data.title: Infor Workforce Management (WFM)

data.text:
Since 2006, VandyWorks has been the scheduling system utilized by nursing and many non-nursing departments across all entities at VUMC. The system allows for autonomy and transparency over scheduling, including self-scheduling, time off planning, shift trading and more.

VandyWorks will be renamed Infor Workforce Management (WFM). Clinical Workstation desktop icons will be updated with the new link during the migration. Users will access the system via Single Sign-On, which will require Multi-Factor Authentication if not connected to VUMC WiFi or the VPN.

Infor Workforce Management (WFM) ensures that scheduling practices across the medical center are in compliance with the Vanderbilt Medical Center's scheduling and staffing policy, Scheduling Process: Patient Care Services.
